title: Enforce JWT validation for API endpoints
description: Every API endpoint must verify JWT authentication before processing requests to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Ensure all try/catch blocks log errors
description: All try/catch blocks must log errors with context. Empty catch blocks are not allowed.

title: Check for 80% test coverage
description: All code must have at least 80% test coverage to ensure reliability and reduce bugs.
suggestedFix: Increase test cases to achieve at least 80% coverage.

title: Limit function length to 50 lines
description: Functions must not exceed 50 lines to maintain readability and manageability.
exampleViolation:
def long_function():
    # 60 lines of code here...
suggestedFix:
def long_function():
    # Refactor to smaller functions
docReference: Section: Code Quality & Structure in acme-code-quality-standards-v2.3.pdf

title: Enforce camelCase for function names
description: All function names must use camelCase (e.g., getUserData, calculateTotal). This improves code consistency and readability.

title: Enforce PascalCase for class names
description: All class names must use PascalCase (e.g., UserManager, PaymentProcessor). This ensures clarity and consistency.

title: Enforce UPPER_SNAKE_CASE for constants
description: All constants must use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE (e.g., MAX_RETRIES, API_SECRET_KEY) to distinguish them from variables.

title: Ensure file names use kebab-case
description: All file names must use kebab-case (e.g., user-manager.py, payment-processor.js) for consistency.

title: Ensure all functions have docstrings
description: Every function must have a docstring that describes its purpose and parameters to improve documentation.
